title: 超给力！1.8试玩版内置！
txt_content:
本帖最后由 8496 于 2011-9-10 11:17 编辑 




TooManyItems2011_09_09.zip
(23.54 KB, 下载次数: 512)



2011-9-10 10:26 上传
点击文件名下载附件






放进minecraft.jar




基佬们，试玩版单人指令你们别想啦，蛤蛤蛤蛤


Regarding MC1.8: Apparently the update will be split into several smaller updates, therefore to avoid losing the use of SPC until it is updated for 1.8 stay on 1.7. Also the SPC update will not be released until either MCP is out OR all the features of 1.8 have been released and I get several hours of my time to update the mod.
